price: 18. Elle dit : « Je cherche refuge auprès du Tout Clément contre toi. Si seulement tu pouvais Le craindre ! »
arabic: قَالَتۡ إِنِّيٓ أَعُوذُ بِٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ مِنكَ إِن كُنتَ تَقِيّٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qālat innī aʿūdhu bil-raḥmāni minka in kunta taqiyyan
